verses.text: And all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w* from the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Sin|strong="H5512"\w*, after their \w journeys|strong="H4550"\w*, according to the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* in \w Rephidim|strong="H7508"\w*: and \add there was\add* no \w water|strong="H4325"\w* for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.

Wherefore the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* did \w chide|strong="H7378"\w* with \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* us \w water|strong="H4325"\w* that we may \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*. And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Why \w chide|strong="H7378"\w* ye with me? wherefore do ye \w tempt|strong="H5254"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*?

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w thirsted|strong="H6770"\w* there for \w water|strong="H4325"\w*; and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w murmured|strong="H3885"\w* against \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Wherefore \add is\add* this \add that\add* thou hast \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* us up out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, to \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* us and our \w children|strong="H1121"\w* and our \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* with \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w*?

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, What shall I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*? they be \w almost|strong="H4592"\w* ready to \w stone|strong="H5619"\w* me.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Go \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* with thee of the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and thy \w rod|strong="H4294"\w*, wherewith thou \w smotest|strong="H5221"\w* the \w river|strong="H2975"\w*, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w go|strong="H1980"\w*.

Behold, I will \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee there upon the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* in \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w*; and thou shalt \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*, and there shall \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* out of it, that the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* may \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*. And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* so in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w Massah|strong="H4532"\w*, and \w Meribah|strong="H4809"\w*, because of the \w chiding|strong="H7379"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and because they \w tempted|strong="H5254"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Is|strong="H3426"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* us, or not?  +  r 17.7  t Massah: that is, Temptation *  +  r 17.7  t Meribah: that is, Chiding, or, Strife *
¶ Then \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w*, and \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* with \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in \w Rephidim|strong="H7508"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, Choose us \w out|strong="H0977"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, and go \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* with \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w*: to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* I will \w stand|strong="H5324"\w* on the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w hill|strong="H1389"\w* with the \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.\f + \fr 17.9 \ft Joshua: called Jesus\f*

So \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* as \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* had \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to him, and \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* with \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w*: and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and \w Hur|strong="H2354"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w hill|strong="H1389"\w*.

And it came to pass, when \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* held \w up|strong="H7311"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, that \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w prevailed|strong="H1396"\w*: and when he let \w down|strong="H5117"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w* \w prevailed|strong="H1396"\w*.

But \w Moses’|strong="H4872"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \add were\add* \w heavy|strong="H3515"\w*; and they \w took|strong="H3947"\w* a \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* under him, and he \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* thereon; and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and \w Hur|strong="H2354"\w* stayed \w up|strong="H8551"\w* his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, the one on the one \w side|strong="H0259"\w*, and the other on the other \w side|strong="H0259"\w*; and his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* were \w steady|strong="H0530"\w* until the going \w down|strong="H0935"\w* of the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*.
And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w discomfited|strong="H2522"\w* \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w* and his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Write|strong="H3789"\w* this \add for\add* a \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w* in a \w book|strong="H5612"\w*, and \w rehearse|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*: for I will \w utterly|strong="H4229"\w* put \w out|strong="H4229"\w* the \w remembrance|strong="H2143"\w* of \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w* from under \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of it \w Jehovah-nissi|strong="H3071"\w*:\f + \fr 17.15 \ft Jehovah-nissi: that is, The \+nd LORD\+nd* my banner\f*

For he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Because the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*
d* hath \w sworn|strong="H3027"\w* \add that\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add will have\add* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* with \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w* from \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* to \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*.  +  r 17.16  t Because…: or, Because the hand of Amalek is against the throne of the \+nd LORD\+nd*, therefore, etc *  +  r 17.16  t the \+nd LORD\+nd* hath…: Heb. the hand upon the throne of the \+nd LORD\+nd* *
